channel.title: 508 help please!
channel.description:
Ok heres the deal every time I download a 508 client & source on the source when i go into cmd and hit run is says file not specified or w/e, So i can't really do anything with it... I'm not a good coder I'm kinda going step by step learning on my own. This i just dont get. Also idk were the compiler is either. sound dumb right? well i have the 508cache on my c drive or what ever you want to call it. will someone please give a explanation for me to work this? with good detail if possible please!!!!!!!
of you want to help me through msn: let-me-b@hotmail.com

item.title: 508 help please!
item.dc:creator: @Zillionair1 Zillionair1
item.description:
@Zillionair1 wrote:

@echo off
cd …/bin
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\java.exe” palidino76/rs2/Server 43594
pause
Try this.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 help please!

item.description:
@demon_2242 wrote:

still said path no specifided heres what my run.bat says

@echo off
cd …/bin
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_11\bin\java.exe” palidino76/rs2/Server 43594
pause

item.title: 508 help please!
item.dc:creator: @Zillionair1 Zillionair1
item.description:
@Zillionair1 wrote:

On the run.bat, right click, edit, and change the java version to your java version
If the client command says “error_js5_connect” you need to run the server first and have the client in cache 508

Read full topic
